meaning: राधा: Radha (name of a Hindu Goddess)वामांश: vamansh (left side, feminine)संभूता: sambhuta (born, arisen)महालक्ष्मी: Mahalakshmi (the Goddess of wealth and prosperity)प्रकीर्तिता: prakirtita (celebrated, praised)Meaning:Radha, the Goddess born from the left side, is praised as Mahalakshmi.
